item.title: A Typology of Enterprise Risks
item.description:
Complex enterprises are vulnerable to a variety of risks. To build an appreciation of the scale and variety of enterprise risks, I built a typology using latest data mining and data organization methods used by our group at Purdue’s Innovation Science Laboratory. The typology uses a top level structure inspired by a recently published paper from our lab. Have a look at the interactive risk typology here.

This resource is the basis for my doctoral research and in-development articles for peer-review. Check back soon for updates on the articles.


The interactive risk typology linked in this blog is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.

Please contact me to get the right citation to use the typology.
